item.title: Springfox plugin for adding auth params
item.description: Generating REST API documentation using Springfox for one of the recent projects I found out that adding authentication header to private api methods is not an obvious task. In accordance with Springfox reference it could be done using globalOperationParameters, however in this case parameter will be added to every endpoint. Dilip Krishnan suggests to create multiple dockets to separate public api from private one. But in my case the only method of public api is /login and it is not reasonable to create docket for a single endpoint. Thus, I wrote a plugin to solve the issue.
